```{r}
A <- matrix(c(2,-1,3,2,2,3,-2,3,0),3,3,TRUE)
b <- c(5,7,-3)
showEqn(A,b)
```
```{r}
Solve(A,b)
```
```{r}
plotEqn3d(A,b)
```

```{r}
echelon(A,b)
```
```{r}
echelon(A,b, verbose=TRUE, fractions=TRUE)
```
```{r}
echelon(A,b, verbose=TRUE)
```
